stepTitle: What Mass of oxygen gas, $$O_2$$, from the air is consumed in the combustion of $$702$$ g of octane, $$C_8 H_{18}$$, one of the principal components of gasoline? The chemical equation: $$2\text{C}_8\text{H}_{18}+25\text{O}_2\rightarrow16\text{CO}_2+18\text{H}_2\text{O}$$.
stepBody: Please give your answer in scientific notation.
